lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is found in the Adams County in Pennsylvania and is categorised as a contributing property. Cumberland County, Pennsylvania is to the north of the Adams County. To the southeast lies Carroll County and to southwest lies Frederick County, both of Maryland.
